user_query: As a small business owner, I'm looking for help in creating catchy slogans and taglines for my brand.

TaskList.description: Conduct research on the brand's target audience to understand their preferences and values.
Analyze competitors' slogans and taglines to identify trends and effective language.
Generate a list of creative slogan and tagline suggestions based on the research and analysis from previous steps.
Review and refine the generated slogans and taglines based on feedback from the target audience.
